alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:24PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Blowing And Drifting Snow Over The Eastern North Slope Through Monday... Blowing and drifting snow will continue over the Eastern North Slope north of Sagwon through Monday. East winds of 20 to 30 mph, with gusts to 40 mph, will continue in those areas through Monday. The winds are expected to decrease slightly on Tuesday. Visibility is expected to remain above 1 mile for most of the time, but could drop briefly below one mile during stronger wind gusts. Snow drifts will continue to form and could make driving difficult. The blowing snow should end on Tuesday, and drifting snow should become less severe on Tuesday.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range
